Love the school‚Äôs art gallery, cosy library and garden for the girls. Their classrooms also provide a positive learning environment.

The P1 orientation tour and info talk were very helpful for us to find out more about the school.
As an alumni, I can tell you that the students there bully teachers and vape. People as young as P2 vape. (Not me)

School students littering and public space and running around in MRT station. The putrefying trash is making it harder for cleaners to clean ! School should educate their students about not littering in public !

Fantastic school that my daughter has been attending for the last 3 years. Teachers are excellent and very caring. My daughter has made loads of friends and loves SACPS. For parents, there is WhatsApp groups and plenty of opportunity to volunteer at school events, though no pressure if you don‚Äôt want too. Got nothing but positive things to say about SACPS. Thanks so much!
